attributes.action: not join bush when he proclaims war on iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: president bush is lethal ... we in the uk have had enough of war and wish the usa well on their fight for world domination.. but we should have no more to do with the evils that bush creates.. let his war be funded by his people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
